com.myronmarston.music.transformers
Class RhythmicDurationTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.transformers.RhythmicDurationTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformer
public class RhythmicDurationTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformer

Transformer that scales the the rhythmic duration of the notes by some scale factor. Example: 1/4 1/8 1/4 -> 1/2 1/4 1/2

Constructor Summary

          Constructor.

          Gets the scale factor.

Constructor Detail

RhythmicDurationTransformer

public RhythmicDurationTransformer(double scaleFactor)
Constructor.

Parameters:
scaleFactor - the scale factor. Factors greater than 1 will increase the speed of the NoteList; factors less than 1 will slow it down.
Method Detail

getScaleFactor

public double getScaleFactor()
Gets the scale factor. Factors less than 1 will increase the speed of the NoteList; factors greater than 1 will slow it down.

Returns:
the scale factor
